content: In an effort to make my interest in contributing more "official," my name is Sam and I've used Rust in hobby projects for about 3-4 years or so. Currently at a large company where I'm trying to convince our C++ devs to jump ship. Looking forward to getting to know people around here.
Advise them to watch John Gjenset (I’m sure I butchered their name) « Considering Rust » talk on YouTube
It’s what convinced me to really make the jump
